## Equations
The Arithmetic mean is equal to $\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=i}^{n} x_{i}$, or the summation
of n numbers divided by n.

$$ H(X)=-\sum_{i}{P(x_i) log_b P(x_i)} $$
